scripts.clean: mkdir -p attachments processed caches logs && rm -rf processed/* logs/*
scripts.clean:full: npm run clean && rm -rf caches/* && touch logs/log_combined.data logs/log_error.data logs/log_warn.data
scripts.prestart: npm run format:js && npm run clean && npm run build && clear
scripts.job1: npm run build; node build/src/worker_parents.js FETCH_THREADS
scripts.job2: npm run build; node build/src/worker_parents.js FETCH_EMAIL
scripts.job2_one: echo npm run build; node build/src/worker_parents.js SINGLE_RUN_FETCH_EMAIL <threadId>
scripts.job3: npm run build; node build/src/worker_parents.js UPLOAD_EMAIL
scripts.job3_one: echo npm run build; node build/src/worker_parents.js SINGLE_RUN_UPLOAD_EMAIL <threadId>
scripts.job4: npm run build; node build/src/worker_parents.js UPLOAD_LOGS
scripts.start: npm run job1; npm run job2; npm run job3
